Training Times

We are currently running two Kendo sessions each week. Beginner sessions run every 4 months, throughout the year.
Please check the Swansea Kendo Club Facebook page in order to confirm current training and beginner event times.

Swansea University Bay Campus

Our Sunday session is open to beginners (via our beginner course) and anyone that has completed the beginner course.

Sunday 10.00 am until 12.00 midday - Main Sports Hall

Swansea University Sports Centre,
Sketty Ln,
Sketty,
Swansea,
SA1 8EP

What Three Words:
https://w3w.co/twin.behind.firms

Penlan Leisure Centre

Thursday practice is open to Kendoka that have their own armour. These sessions are an opportunity to focus on progressing the fundimentals learned at our Sunday sessions. Practice usually ends with Jigeiko.

Thursday 19.16 pm until 20.30 pm - Main Sports Hall

Details on request
